articles.title: A tiny NASA spacecraft launches to test out a new orbit around the Moon - The Verge
articles.description: On June 28th, a microwave-sized NASA spacecraft called CAPSTONE launched on a Rocket Lab Electron rocket bound for the Moon, to test out a new orbit that could be used for a future lunar space station called Gateway.

CAPSTONE is perhaps the first launch in NASAs Artemis program
